title: Sabuk Emperor's Royal Gift
author: MIR4
contents:
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40990380/6af141bf5aa329b6ba28d7919a63cbe324b936d3.png[/img]

[h2]From my battle to our war, MMORPG MIR4[/h2]

Greetings, This is MIR4.

The primal Sabuk Emperors of mir continent has been elected per region after a fierce competition among king clans to conquer the Sabuk Castle in Domination Server.

To commemorate their ascending to Emperor, we will provide the 'Sabuk Emperor's Common Royal Gift' to all Dragonians.

Please refer to the information below for further details.

[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40990380/21805bcaf0657bb00e5ab73704c9c316dcfe4320.jpg[/img]
[h3]Sabuk Emperor's Royal Gift[/h3]

[b]■ Sabuk Emperor's Royal Gift[/b]
- Sabuk Emperor's Common Royal Gift will be provided to all Dragonians to commemorate the rise of the 1st emperors.
- Sabuk Emperor's Common Royal Gift will be sent via mail on April 10th and can be claimed until April 17, 23:59 (UTC+8), 2023.
